settings.text: Build your own Unite LED bar using our custom live configurator tool. Choose your length, pods, and accessories for a completely custom Unite Bar.
Browse our pre-made Unite LED Light Bars that cover the most popular lighting applications

custom_css: .global__section-template--15664487366765__editorial_columns_tEtNUw {background-color: rgb(22, 22, 22); background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-top: 50px; padding-bottom: 50px; background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0273/6724/3885/t/5/assets/pf-65ef7b23--unitesidebackground.png?v=1589480883); border-style: solid; color: #fff;}

settings.text: The UNITE Modular LED Light Bar System brings lighting power and customization to the forefront by allowing you to build your light bar with endless configurations. Our all-new quick connect mounting rail gives you the ability to easily slide on and swap around the modules you choose. Each module features a 4-LED advanced optic design that comes in 8 different styles to match your lighting needs.

settings.heading: KEY FEATURES
settings.subheading:
• Fully Customizable Light Bar System
  • Straight Rail 6”| 12”| 20”| 30”| 40”| 50” Lengths
  • 8 Different Unite Modules to Choose From
  • High Output CREE LEDs
  • 2000+ Lumens Per Module (White LED)
  • Advanced Precision Optics
  • IP68/69K Rated Housing
  • Limited Lifetime Warranty

custom_css: {padding: 40px 0px; background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0273/6724/3885/t/5/assets/pf-6d2e2765--unitevideobackground.jpg?v=1589479904); background-size: cover; background-position: 50% 50%; background-repeat: no-repeat;}

settings.text:
1. PICK YOUR QUICK CONNECT MOUNTING RAIL 6”-50” Lengths
  2. PICK FROM 8 DIFFERENT MODULE OPTIONS Endless Configurations to Match Your Lighting Needs
  3. CHOOSE WIRING AND MOUNTING ACCESSORIES Additional Wiring Options Available

SLIDE AND LOCK MOUNTING SYSTEM The quick connect rail system makes it easy for you to slide on, re-arrange, or swap out modules and is secured using stainless steel hardware.

WATERPROOF CONNECTING PINS The “H” power connectors slide into watertight rubber fittings on either side of the module to allow power to be transferred from one module to the next.

HEAVY DUTY WING MOUNTS Designed to withstand the abuse of any off road adventure, the end cap wing mounts ensure your Unite Bar will stay secured to your vehicle and allow for precise light angle adjustments.

SINGLE OR MULTI-CIRCUIT OUTPUT The modular design gives you the option to power on the entire Unite Bar all at once or power different sections at a time with the help of our wiring accessories.

PRECISION QUAD OPTIC DESIGN Each module features four advanced optics that are coupled with high output CREE LEDs to blast a massive amount of light where you need it most.
